body_html: @monikatomar92 I was able to install TensorFlow using the said environment. It seems that crosstool/gcc is not installed correctly in your system. You can either follow this document to install TensorFlow or use docker.
body_text: @monikatomar92 I was able to install TensorFlow using the said environment. It seems that crosstool/gcc is not installed correctly in your system. You can either follow this document to install TensorFlow or use docker.
body: @monikatomar92 I was able to install TensorFlow using the said environment. It seems that crosstool/gcc is not installed correctly in your system. You can either follow [this document](https://medium.com/@Oysiyl/install-tensorflow-1-8-0-with-gpu-from-source-on-ubuntu-18-04-bionic-beaver-35cfa9df3600) to install TensorFlow or use [docker](https://www.tensorflow.org/install/docker).
